name: Umbelliferone
desc: Umbelliferone, also known as 7-hydroxycoumarin, hydrangine, skimmetine, and beta-umbelliferone, is a natural product of the coumarin family.

images.alt: Unbelliferone, or 7-hydroxycoumarin, is a yellowish white crystalline powder lacking the odor of coumarin, or any strong odor.

Appearance: a yellowish white crystalline powder lacking the odor of coumarin, or any strong odor.
standard state:
